role_description: An Ansible role that installs direnv (a shell extension that can load environment variables based on the current directory) on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [direnv](https://direnv.net/) is an extension for your shell. It augments existing shells with a new feature that can load and unload environment variables depending on the current directory.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs direnv (a shell extension that can load environment variables based on the current directory) on nearly any platform.
